Using his shield as a medium, Renga creates a massive chakra barrier. It is strong enough to withstand a bomb detonation.

== Trivia ==
* The kanji used in this jutsu are usually pronounced as "shadanpeki" due to rendaku, meaning "bulkhead" or "barrier".

[[pt-br:Parede de Quarentena]]
